review_data.title: Dinner buffet

review_data.title: A must for lunch if you're around

review_data.title: Not worth going
review_data.content: I am just now having my first and last dinner at Tibetasia. Expensive and small dishes. Avocado salad based on half avocado and few leaves cost 8 francs, not worth 4. Green curry with tofu and rice, could easily be described as kids meal. Slow...More

review_data.title: Great food but slow service
review_data.content: The dinner was very nice, food is excellent, service very friendly and polite, but very slow. I hope that this delay has been just accidental - we have enjoyed the dinner very much.

review_data.title: great ethnic food
review_data.content: These guys cook and cater and their food is delicious, as is their level of attention. The momos are great

review_data.title: Really tasty food at reasonable prices
review_data.content: This Tibetan restaurand in Zürich is worth checking out. The food is great and considering the fact that you're in Zürich, the prices are very reasonable. I loved the fried shrimps and the curries are taste throughout.

review_data.title: Nice and tasty
